thread.title: Senior Financial Analyst Job at Yoh (Silver Spring, MD)
thread.title_full: Senior Financial Analyst Job at Yoh (Silver Spring, MD)

title: Senior Financial Analyst Job at Yoh (Silver Spring, MD)
text:
Source: Jobg8 
Sr. Financial Analyst needed for a contract opportunity with Yoh's client located in Silver Spring, MD. 
Top Skills You Should Possess: - Excellent excel skills - Experience with Financial Systems (SAP, BPC/EPM) a plus. - Three to four (3-4) years of experience in Finance. MBA a plus 
What You'll Be Doing: - Assist in the creation of monthly management reporting and various presentations for senior management. - Support FP&A team in the monthly forecast cycle, close deliverables and report maintenance. - Assist in annual budget process by working closely with department heads to prepare a "bottom-up" budget that aligns with the "top-down" strategic plan. - Perform monthly financial results review and reporting, providing recommendations and feedback to senior management on the current and future financial positions of the division to ensure the achievement of the division's objectives. - Improve and streamline processes around reporting. - Develop appropriate systems and tools to facilitate efficient, effective and accurate analysis. 
What You Need to Bring to the Table: - Ability to work on multiple projects - Ability to meet stringent deadlines and work under pressure - Demonstrated self starter, high integrity, team player - Strong organizational, communications and interpersonal skills required. - Excellent attention to detail 
What are you waiting for? Opportunity is Calling, Apply Now! 
Recruiter: LaVerne Edwards 
Yoh, a Day & Zimmermann company, is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V. Contact us if you are an individual with a disability and require accommodation in the application process. 
J2W: PROF
